mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_history (id, sender, receiver, owner, type, file_id, content, send_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{owner}, #{type}, #{fileId}, #{content}, #{time})
INSERT INTO chat_group_history (id, sender, receiver, owner, type, file_id, content, send_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{owner}, #{type}, #{fileId}, #{content}, #{time})
INSERT INTO chat_history_cache (id, sender, receiver, type, file_id, content, send_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{type}, #{fileId}, #{content}, #{time})
mapper.select: SELECT chat_history_cache.id as id, chat_history_cache.sender as sender, chat_history_cache.receiver as receiver, chat_history_cache.type as type, chat_history_cache.file_id as fileId, chat_files.file_name as fileName, chat_files.file_type as fileType, chat_files.file_size as fileSize, chat_history_cache.content as content, chat_history_cache.send_time as time FROM chat_history_cache LEFT JOIN chat_files ON chat_history_cache.file_id = chat_files.file_id WHERE chat_history_cache.receiver = #{userId} ORDER BY send_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_list (user_id, chat_list) VALUES (#{userId}, #{ChatListJson}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_id = #{userId}, chat_list = #{ChatListJson}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, chat_list as chatList FROM chat_list WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT chat_files.file_id as fileId, chat_files.file_name as fileName, chat_files.file_type as fileType, chat_files.file_size as fileSize, chat_files.sender as sender, users.username as senderName, users.avatar as senderAvatar, chat_files.create_time as createTime FROM chat_files LEFT JOIN users ON chat_files.sender = users.id WHERE chat_files.sender = #{userId} OR chat_files.receiver = #{userId} LIMIT #{pageSize}
OFFSET #{pageOffset}

SELECT chat_history.id as id, chat_history.sender as sender, users.username as senderName, users.avatar as senderAvatar, chat_history.receiver as receiver, chat_history.type as type, chat_history.file_id as fileId,
chat_images.image_name as imageName, chat_images.image_type as imageType, chat_images.image_size as imageSize,
chat_files.file_name as fileName, chat_files.file_type as fileType, chat_files.file_size as fileSize,
chat_history.content as content, chat_history.send_time as time FROM chat_history LEFT JOIN users ON chat_history.sender = users.id
LEFT JOIN chat_images ON chat_history.file_id = chat_images.image_id
LEFT JOIN chat_files ON chat_history.file_id = chat_files.file_id
((chat_history.owner = #{userId} AND chat_history.receiver = #{friendId}) OR (chat_history.owner = #{userId} AND chat_history.sender = #{friendId}))
AND chat_history.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKey}, '%')
AND (chat_history.type = 'image' OR chat_history.type = 'video')
AND chat_images.image_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKey}, '%')
AND chat_history.type = 'file'
AND chat_files.file_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKey}, '%')
AND send_time < #{lastTime}
ORDER BY send_time DESC LIMIT #{pageSize}
